title: 20 ban glitch?
body: So me and my friend 'MingWongChing' were placed in 5 low queue games for 20 minutes each. So today on the 29th of January 2015 we went to play some fun League Of Legends. We play 1 game in which a friendly League Of Legends participant fed and cried all game long. So after having a ridiculous amount of fun in that game we then waited another 20 minutes for another game. The 20 minute queue was done and we found a game so i went to click and 'accept' and i did click 'accept'. Did i get into a game? no i did not. So i waited 20 minutes for what? Well the answer is i got an extremely satisfying message that read "Error joining game, Active game was not found." So now i have to wait another 20 minutes to get into a game, once again. And the previous 20 minute queue time did not count towards a strike off of the total 5 games that i have to be placed in low priority queue. Thoughts anyone?

replies.body:
It's blooby.

I'd say to try and play games without duo-queuing to see if you don't get the same error, at least until the low priority queue is lifted.
